column1: wanda may mc. fall| wanda may mc. fallborn: november 04
column3: 2015. local florists wanda may (burkhead) mc. fall
column6: passed away at 10:20 a. m. on thursday
column8: 2015 at wabash christian retirement center in carmi. funeral services for wanda may mc. fall
column13: 2015 at 4:00 p. m. at campbell funeral home in carmi with rev. bob mc. kelvey officiating. friends may call on saturday
column14: from 2:00 p. m. until time of service at campbell funeral home. on monday
column16: 2015 additional services will be held at melby funeral home in platteville
column17: wisconsin at 11:00 a. m. with visiting from 9:00 a. m. until time of service. burial will be in greenwood cemetery in platteville. memorial gifts may be given in wanda's name to emmanuel united methodist church and will be accepted at campbell funeral home in carmi. she was born on november 4
column20: the daughter of loren and stella (boxley) burkhead. wanda married douglas g. mc. fall on june 3
column21: 1949. she worked as a telephone operator for general telephone and later as a housewife and did babysitting for the neighborhood children. wanda was a member of emmanuel united methodist church and united methodist women. surviving are her husband of 66 years
column25: daniel and kathleen mc. fall of mascoutah
column31: and philip (racheal) cook; nine great-grandchildren; a sister-in-law
column33: ne and numerous nieces and nephews. wanda was preceded in death by five sisters
column37: portia van leuven and audrey petersen; and two brothers
